column1: Pregnant or breastfeeding

Known hypersensitivity to the study drug or its components
Participation in another clinical trial within 30 days
Major surgery within 4 weeks prior to enrollment
History of non-compliance with medical regimens
Unwilling or unable to comply with the protocol
Significant medical condition that could interfere with the study

Planned elective surgery during the study period
Life expectancy less than 6 months
Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status > 2
Karnofsky Performance Status (KPS) score < 60%
Prior treatment with similar agents
